title: Loan Shark

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Force someone to pay you tonight. They have to pay you with 1 tier of Attack or Defense. It's taken from them, and you can give it to yourself or one of your teammates. If the target has None attack and None or Vulnerable defense you will just attack them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You cannot attack people unless you use your ability or use the factional kill.

desc:
Post 1454
*Did you pay your debts from a month ago? If you didn't, I will take something else from you...*
